languages.text: {n}Что-то изменилось в Паскале. Едва уловимая смущенная пауза предваряет каждое его движение, будто он совершает его впервые.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, выражаю свою благодарность за содействие, оказанное в... прекращении схизмы Прерывания Цикла. {d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Loyal}Ваше участие{/d} не будет забыто".

{n}Something has changed about Pasqal. A barely perceptible awkward pause precedes his every movement, as though he were making it for the first time.{/n} "Lord Captain, allow me to express my gratitude for your assistance in... putting an end to the schism of Discontinuing the Cycle. {d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Loyal}Your contribution{/d} will not be forgotten."
languages.original_text: {n}Что-то изменилось в Паскале. Едва уловимая смущенная пауза предваряет каждое его движение, будто он совершает его впервые.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, выражаю свою благодарность за содействие, оказанное в... прекращении схизмы Прерывания Цикла. {d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Loyal}Ваше участие{/d} не будет забыто".

traits.locale_text: {n}Something has changed about Pasqal. A barely perceptible awkward pause precedes his every movement, as though he were making it for the first time ever.{/n} "Lord Captain, allow me to express my gratitude for your assistance in... putting an end to the schism of Discontinuing the Cycle. Your contribution will not be forgotten."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

Your contribution will not be forgotten."

Your contribution will not be forgotten."

A barely perceptible awkward pause precedes his every movement, as though he were making it for the first time.{/n} "Lord Captain, allow me to express my gratitude for your assistance in... putting an end to the schism of Discontinuing the Cycle. {d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Loyal}Your contribution{/d} will not be forgotten."

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡有什么地方不一样了。他在做每个动作之前，都会尴尬地停顿片刻，仿佛是第一次做这个动作一样。{/n}“舰长大人，请允许我向你表示感谢。感谢你结束了这种……终结循环的分裂行为。{d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Loyal}你的贡献{/d}将会被始终铭记。”
languages.original_text: {n}Something has changed about Pasqal. A barely perceptible awkward pause precedes his every movement, as though he were making it for the first time.{/n} "Lord Captain, allow me to express my gratitude for your assistance in... putting an end to the schism of Discontinuing the Cycle. {d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Loyal}Your contribution{/d} will not be forgotten."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡有什么地方不一样了。他在做每个动作之前，都会尴尬地停顿片刻，仿佛是第一次做这个动作一样。{/n}“舰长大人，请允许我向你表示感谢。感谢你结束了这种……终结循环的分裂行为。你的贡献将会被始终铭记。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Algo ha cambiado en Pasqal. Una breve pausa incómoda precede a cada movimiento, como si fuera la primera vez que lo hace.{/n} «Lord Capitán, permítame expresarle mi agradecimiento por su ayuda en... finalizar el cisma de la Discontinuidad del Ciclo. {d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Loyal}Su contribución{/d} no será olvidada».
languages.original_text: {n}Something has changed about Pasqal. A barely perceptible awkward pause precedes his every movement, as though he were making it for the first time.{/n} "Lord Captain, allow me to express my gratitude for your assistance in... putting an end to the schism of Discontinuing the Cycle. {d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Loyal}Your contribution{/d} will not be forgotten."

traits.locale_text: {n}Algo ha cambiado en Pasqal. Una breve pausa incómoda precede a cada movimiento, como si fuera la primera vez que lo hace.{/n} «Lord Capitán, permítame expresarle mi agradecimiento por su ayuda en... finalizar el cisma de la Discontinuidad del Ciclo. Su contribución no será olvidada».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルの何かが変わった。かろうじて感じられるぎこちない間が、まるで初めての動きかのように感じさせられた。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、サイクル廃止の分裂に終止符を打ったあなたの援助に感謝の意を表させてもらいたい。あなたの{d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Loyal}貢献{/d}は決して忘れない」
languages.original_text: {n}Something has changed about Pasqal. A barely perceptible awkward pause precedes his every movement, as though he were making it for the first time.{/n} "Lord Captain, allow me to express my gratitude for your assistance in... putting an end to the schism of Discontinuing the Cycle. {d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Loyal}Your contribution{/d} will not be forgotten."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルの何かが変わった。かろうじて感じられるぎこちない間が、まるで初めての動きかのように感じさせられた。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、サイクル廃止の分裂に終止符を打ったあなたの援助に感謝の意を表させてもらいたい。あなたの{d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Loyal}貢献{/d}は決して忘れない」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Irgendetwas hat sich an Pasqal verändert. Jeder Bewegung geht eine kaum wahrnehmbare unbeholfene Pause voraus, als würde er diese Bewegung zum ersten Mal ausführen.{/n} "Lord Captain, gestattet mir, meinem Dank Ausdruck zu verleihen, für Eure Hilfe dabei ... die Spaltung der Unterbrechung des Kreislaufs zu beenden. {d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Loyal}Euer Beitrag{/d} wird nicht vergessen werden."
languages.original_text: {n}Something has changed about Pasqal. A barely perceptible awkward pause precedes his every movement, as though he were making it for the first time.{/n} "Lord Captain, allow me to express my gratitude for your assistance in... putting an end to the schism of Discontinuing the Cycle. {d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Loyal}Your contribution{/d} will not be forgotten."

traits.locale_text: {n}Irgendetwas hat sich an Pasqal verändert. Jeder Bewegung geht eine kaum wahrnehmbare unbeholfene Pause voraus, als würde er diese Bewegung zum ersten Mal ausführen.{/n} "Lord Captain, gestattet mir, meinem Dank Ausdruck zu verleihen, für Eure Hilfe dabei ... die Spaltung der Unterbrechung des Kreislaufs zu beenden. Euer Beitrag wird nicht vergessen werden."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal n'est plus tout à fait comme avant. Une pause gênée à peine perceptible précède ses mouvements, comme s'il effectuait chaque geste pour la première fois.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, permettez-moi d'exprimer toute ma reconnaissance pour votre aide quant à la... résolution du schisme de l'Interruption du Cycle. Je n'oublierai pas {d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Loyal}ce que vous avez fait{/d}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Something has changed about Pasqal. A barely perceptible awkward pause precedes his every movement, as though he were making it for the first time.{/n} "Lord Captain, allow me to express my gratitude for your assistance in... putting an end to the schism of Discontinuing the Cycle. {d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Loyal}Your contribution{/d} will not be forgotten."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal n'est plus tout à fait comme avant. Une pause gênée à peine perceptible précède ses mouvements, comme s'il effectuait chaque geste pour la première fois.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, permettez-moi d'exprimer toute ma reconnaissance pour votre aide quant à la... résolution du schisme de l'Interruption du Cycle. Je n'oublierai pas ce que vous avez fait. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Something has changed about Pasqal. A barely perceptible awkward pause precedes his every movement, as though he were making it for the first time.{/n} "Lord Captain, allow me to express my gratitude for your assistance in... putting an end to the schism of Discontinuing the Cycle. Your contribution will not be forgotten."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'da değişen bir şeyler var. Her hareketinin öncesinde güçlükle fark edebilen ilginç bir duraksama yaşanıyor. Sanki bu hareketleri ilk kez yapıyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, Döngü Süreğinin Bozulumu bölünmesine bir son verme konusundaki destekleriniz için minnetimi ifade etmek istemekteyim. {d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Loyal}Katkınız{/d} unutulmayacak."
languages.original_text: {n}Something has changed about Pasqal. A barely perceptible awkward pause precedes his every movement, as though he were making it for the first time.{/n} "Lord Captain, allow me to express my gratitude for your assistance in... putting an end to the schism of Discontinuing the Cycle. {d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Loyal}Your contribution{/d} will not be forgotten."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal'da değişen bir şeyler var. Her hareketinin öncesinde güçlükle fark edebilen ilginç bir duraksama oluyor. Sanki bu hareketleri ilk kez yapıyormuş gibi.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, Döngüyü Kırma bölünmesine bir son vermek konusundaki destekleriniz için minnetimi ifade etmeme izin verin. Yaptığınız katkılar unutulmayacak."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
